name: Max Oakland New Song Reveal
description:
The new song is out! I Prefer the Dusk is available on all streaming platforms. Listen here: https://songwhip.com/max-oakland/i-prefer-the-dusk  You can also purchase it here as the soundtrack for this game if you want to support me as an artist & videogame maker

I'm releasing a new song on August 23rd and I want to do a little fun promotion thing with it.

So: Play this game to reveal the title and cover art, which are still secret. The first person to send me a screenshot of the cover art will get a shoutout on my social media!

If you win the level, you can even hear the full song a day early.

Note: this game doesn't work on my phone because it doesn't fit on the screen. It might work on your phone. This is the first time I've used GameMaker's HTML export and I didn't know how to set it up right. Learning experience!
